summary.para: Specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the Alpha channel.

param.name: alphaDisable
param.para: A boolean value that specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the alpha channel. If you set this to TRUE the effect does not apply the transfer function to the Alpha channel. If you set this to FALSE it applies the AlphaTableTransfer function to the Alpha channel.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the list of values used to define the transfer function for the alpha channel.

param.name: tableValues
param.para: The list of values used to define the transfer function for the alpha channel.

param.name: count
param.para: The number of values in the tableValues parameter.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets a value in the alpha table.

param.name: index
param.para: The index of the value to set.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets a value in the alpha table.

param.name: index
param.para: Index of the value to change.

param.name: animation
param.para: An animation that represents how the value in the alpha table changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the blue channel.

param.name: blueDisable
param.para: A boolean value that specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the blue channel. If you set this to TRUE the effect does not apply the transfer function to the blue channel. If you set this to FALSE it applies the BlueTableTransfer function to the Blue channel.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the list of values used to define the transfer function for the blue channel.

param.para: The list of values used to define the transfer function for the blue channel.

param.para: The number of values in the tableValues parameter.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: index
param.para: The index of the value to set.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets a value in the blue table.

param.name: index
param.para: The index of the value to set.

param.name: animation
param.para: An animation that represents how the value changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Specifies whether the effect clamps color values to between 0 and 1 before the effect passes the values to the next effect in the graph.

param.name: clampOutput
param.para: A boolean value that specifies whether the effect clamps color values to between 0 and 1 before the effect passes the values to the next effect in the graph. If you set this to TRUE the effect will clamp the values. If you set this to FALSE, the effect will not clamp the color values, but other effects and the output surface may clamp the values if they are not of high enough precision. The effect clamps the values before it premultiplies the alpha.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the green channel.

param.name: greenDisable
param.para: A boolean value that specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the green channel. If you set this to TRUE the effect does not apply the transfer function to the green channel. If you set this to FALSE it applies the GreenTableTransfer function to the green channel.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The table transfer effect is used to map the color intensities of an image using a transfer function created from interpolating a list of values you provide.
